answers.answer: You won't have a miscarriage because your overweight. Miscarriages happen mostly due to chromosome issues.If you are overweight and pregnant then you should be adjusting your diet so that you are eating healthy and do some light exercise like walking to improve your fitness and help prepare yourself when it's time to give birth when you'll need extra energy.

Well, I'm obese, i didn't think that because of my weight, I could get pregnant and I did paste year, even tho I had a miscarriage at 17 weeks, but it wasn't because of that, it was because I have fibroids, and a week ago I found out I'm pregnant again, but just take care of yourself, and try eating healthy because I developed diabetes in my first trimester, that's why I'm taking better care of myself this time, so good luck with your pregnancy

question: Im 6 weeks pregnant and I am extremely scared that I might have a miscarriage due to my weight I've been experiencing sometimes very mild cramping
title: overweight and scared
